description.value:
>@Compendium[sfrpg.classes.0tC4GBpJ0S17VR6a]{Precog}

You learn your first temporal anomaly (page 10) at 2nd level and an additional temporal anomaly every 3 levels thereafter. Temporal anomalies all require you meet a minimum precog level, and they are organized accordingly. Some temporal anomalies require you to satisfy other prerequisites, such as having other temporal anomalies. For effects that require a saving throw, the DC is 10 + half your precog level + your Dexterity modifier.

2nd Level

You must be at least 2nd level to choose the following temporal anomalies.

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.3v06vHi7BT5hKfqJ]{Advanced Preparation (Su)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.77qu3zLcdsaGe5k2]{Ephemeral Confidant (Su)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.bflstIKfQVGhHazP]{Future Training (Ex)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.KrmdYdV4GwMNkaPx]{Prescient Casting (Su)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.CMjzIVhY6XdvHcuo]{Safeguard (Su)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.pMjIAS7Bz7XjfZKS]{Shunt Condition (Su)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.jpY1gQVKvkh4IQb2]{Tactical Timing (Su)}

You must be at least 5th level to choose the following temporal anomalies.

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.wSkGKzlRRc2nvnxF]{I Knew You’d Say That (Su)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.ieS3x15PGNRSdC7q]{Multifocal (Su)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.oVf1FnpVNjz3PxNg]{Spell Rewind (Su)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.4buERtwuOgonHdoY]{Time-Hardened (Ex)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.6haARxwMWqzhaETo]{Momentary Stutter (Su)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.2GgPq7o4FSqlzKdt]{Skillful Rewrite (Su)}
